casebody.data:
Ken BAKER Plaintiff—Appellant, v. UNITED DOMINION INDUSTRIES, INC., doing business as Waukesha Cherry-Burrell Defendant—Appellee. No. 02-6081. United States Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Feb. 3, 2004. Jeffrey T. Sampson, Sampson, Smith & Slechter, Louisville, ICY, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Ronald L. Gaffney, Pedley, Zielke, Gordinier & Pence, Louisville, KY, for Defendant-Appellee.

*918Before MERRITT and SUTTON, Circuit Judges; and FEIKENS, District Judge.*

The Honorable John Feikens, Senior District Judge for the e Eastern District of Michigan, sitting by designation.

ORDER

This cause having come on to be heard upon the record, the briefs and the oral argument of the parties, and upon due consideration thereof,

It is ORDERED that the judgment of the district court be, and it hereby is, affirmed upon the opinion of the district court.
